item.title: Facebook introduces a user-friendly, streamlined video advertising format
item.description:
Over one-third of mobile internet users in Saudi Arabia are receptive to video advertisements, exceeding the global average of 22%. Facebook is introducing “Slideshow,” a new, user-friendly video ad format designed to increase reach across various devices and connection speeds. In a blog post announcing Slideshow, Facebook highlights a recent report indicating that people in regions like the Philippines, where connectivity can be slow, costly, or both, and where feature phones are common, are even more receptive to video ads...
